titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to remove certain gender references and to make technical corrections.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

bill.summary: 2/5/1987--Introduced. Amends various provisions of Federal law relating to veterans to remove certain gender references and make technical corrections.
